replies.msg:
Actually it’s the moment you two settle down and start simply chatting, then say sth deep gradually.

Or you can seriously ask him out for a conversation, conveying him a message that you are gonna talk sth serious and he knows he should be serious too.

Don’t just say sth causally like ask him to change. As many of us,men, do not notice the seriousness of problem. We just thought it’s okay she just want more attention, I will do it better next time.

So you have to show him your attitude, otherwise no one cares

quote.msg:
Take care chingI really need a deep conversation with him. Hope that he can understand my feelings more someday.
But sometimes I don’t know when it’s the right time to start a conversation.
Any ideas?

Actually it’s the moment you two settle down and start simply chatting, then say sth deep gradually.

Or you can seriously ask him out for a conversation, conveying him a message that you are gonna talk sth serious and he knows he should be serious too.

Don’t just say sth causally like ask him to change. As many of us,men, do not notice the seriousness of problem. We just thought it’s okay she just want more attention, I will do it better next time.

So you have to show him your attitude, otherwise no one cares

Thanks chingI seldom have deep talk with himI am lack of confidence and worried about how he feels about me if I suddenly talk sth serious

I don’t really understand what men usually think in their mind and how to communicate with him well in order to have a better relationship.

replies.msg:
No need to worry. If he loves you so much, he won’t think it’s odd for you two communicating sth serious.

You should give him time and chance. You can’t expect your first deep talk can bring sth new insights in his mind. We, men, actually are not smart enough to comprehend the things or problems you just proposed few minutes ago. We can’t give you the answer you want unless we consider thoroughly.

So what you are gonna is to convey him your true feeling. Then you give him time to precipitate his thoughts towards you. Let him realise the issue between you guys.

If he really loves you, he definitely change the old habits for good. Men are somehow insensitive to girl’s ideas and thoughts.

I am a living example that my girl expected me to find her frequently right after we broke up but in my opinion I thought she needed time to relax and settle negative feelings as she didn’t give me any response when I sent her numbers of handmade pop-cards and gifts. I thought she was tired of my action so I chose to wait her to reply. Eventually, I fucked up.

quote.msg: 有冇同佢傾下？

都講得需要空間啦 你知我知 傾完都唔會有咩改變 只好自己習慣
好撚掛住熱戀期既時候

我都係咁傾完係有主動過一次，之後又回復原狀唯有習慣佢係啲咁嘅人
我都好掛住熱戀期成日揾住對方嘅感覺

replies.msg:
Now I know what should I do. But she is gone. I asked her many times that gave us a chance, together we can make better . But she just said past is past, no need to recall your best memories between us, let it go and move on.

So heart-broken, could we not have another chance still?

P.S. broken up about 1 month

不過我係分手收場。


伸脷：過來人 我就係果位廢物男友

好後悔果陣冇好好珍惜佢

唯有迫自己做主動嗰個，但係真係會驚自己會有一日覺得攰，不過我又真係好鍾意佢
點解男人永遠都係失去咗先會珍惜

有時真係好想知點先可以維繫好啲個關係

replies.msg:
倉央嘉措《問佛》

我問佛：世間為何又那麼多遺憾？
佛曰：這是一個婆娑世界，婆娑即遺憾，
沒有遺憾，給你再多的幸福也不會體會快樂。


原文網址：https://kknews.cc/essay/gbg2rql.html

quote.msg:
No need to worry. If he loves you so much, he won’t think it’s odd for you two communicating sth serious.

You should give him time and chance. You can’t expect your first deep talk can bring sth new insights in his mind. We, men, actually are not smart enough to comprehend the things or problems you just proposed few minutes ago. We can’t give you the answer you want unless we consider thoroughly.

So what you are gonna is to convey him your true feeling. Then you give him time to precipitate his thoughts towards you. Let him realise the issue between you guys.

If he really loves you, he definitely change the old habits for good. Men are somehow insensitive to girl’s ideas and thoughts.

I am a living example that my girl expected me to find her frequently right after we broke up but in my opinion I thought she needed time to relax and settle negative feelings as she didn’t give me any response when I sent her numbers of handmade pop-cards and gifts. I thought she was tired of my action so I chose to wait her to reply. Eventually, I fucked up.

Yea ching you are rightSometimes the way of how men think is definitely different from that of girls.

I think I really need some time to talk with him instead of escaping and ignoring the issue between two of us.

This will just worsen the relationship. I cannot expect him to understand me well without telling him my thoughts.

I wish my bf can send me handmade stuff too but these chances do not belong to me.

It’s fine if he doesn’t make you any DIY gifts. Everyone has their own way to love. He will find his way to you.

Yes. Communication is vital as well as listening.
You should not think all the things go wrong because of his attitude. You should think before you ask. Was there anything I did misguiding him to treat you in this way?

My girl didn’t have deep talk with me, but she warned me several times with calm and peaceful tone. I didn’t realise it was an emergent signal appeared towards our relationship.....

但佢就答我話咁我而家已經開始咗返工，我返工好攰你唔明㗎啦，我都係有返啲私人時間，想做下自己野，話其實你有啲咩想做可以叫你朋友去陪你，唔一定要搵我
佢話想我理解下佢，但同時我都想你理解返我

想放工見一陣又話攰，放假又想休息，就算真係出到街都係好遲先出門，又話另一日要返工要早返屋企
依家就算成功chur到佢出去，都睇得出個樣唔再係好似之前咁開心，會成日玩手機，話我搞到佢抖唔到氣，無晒私人時間
前排鬧左場大交差啲分手（係因為佢有對我唔住再先），最後佢求我唔好分手，先開始冇再有咁大怨言，但到依家耐左又變返鬧交之前咁，我近排仲因為咁成日都發佢脾氣，又會因為冇安全感而無啦啦喊，搞到成日又鬧交，feel到佢都覺得我好煩
我依家都好攰啦，對我真係唔捨得分手呀

我嗰個係次次好難得出街都話又攰又熱，行多一陣又話悶要返屋企，有時真係諗嘜同我出街真係好悶咩
我都係睇得出佢同我出街一見到我個樣都冇以前咁好笑容好似我迫佢受難咁
最慘嘅係，次次我想同佢傾下哩啲問題，佢就以為我亂發脾氣，然後就一尾識得逃避，話唔想鬧交，傷感情又麻煩但係唔講清楚又點會解決到問題

我都係一個好冇安全感嘅人，好想佢主動同我講多啲佢嘅感受，但係又怕佢覺得我好煩，唔知點開口
愛佢嘅話，真係好難捨得佢唔開心同分手

又會同佢講話出邊咁熱都唔知有咩好行，行完又同佢講終於同完女朋友出街啦
仲有其他不過唔多講啦
